johneagle.routesolve.domain

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • johneagle.routesolve.domain.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid

    public class Map
extends Object
implements Grid
    Object to handle ascii map and any straightly related actions. Uses configurations given to it to know about ascii types purposes. Also gives manhattan distance estimation between coordinates and simple has to represent matrix as a line.
    Author:
    Johneagle

      • getValueForMovement

        public double getValueForMovement(int fromX,
                                  int fromY,
                                  int whereX,
                                  int whereY)
        Method returns cost of moving from one block to another next to it. Currently in straight this means one and in diagonally it means square two. All other coordinate pairs result in returning zero.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        fromY - y-coordinate came

        whereY - y-coordinate go
